document_data.name: Glimmergrass
document_data.mainbody:
'''Glimmergrass''' was a type of grass with [[Wikipedia:Bioluminescence|bioluminescent]] properties. It could be used to make a luminous unguent with a green glow.

[[Dovo]] of [[Ghars]], [[Cormyr]], painted himself and his armor with this unguent in order to impersonate the [[ghost]] of [[Fastred]] and scare townsfolk in [[1367 DR]].
